item.title: 仿人机器人在半程马拉松展示中蹒跚前行
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，Saritha Rai 将报道仿人机器人上周在中国参加半程马拉松比赛后的前景。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. item.title: 特朗普的关税措施可能给全球经济带来 2 万亿美元的冲击
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，资深经济学编辑。今天，我们将对贸易战可能造成的全球经济损失进行一次新的统计。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, a senior economics editor. item.title: 亚洲出口大国寻求谈判以获得特朗普关税减免
item.description: 本周，来自世界各地的财政部长和央行行长将齐聚华盛顿，参加国际货币基金组织（IMF）和世界银行的春季会议。但他们代表团中的关键人物可能是那些通常不引人注意的官员：贸易谈判代表。【原文：Finance ministers and central bankers from around the world are gathering in Washington this week for the Spring Meetings of the IMF and World Bank. But the key figures in their delegations might be officials who usually don’t attract the limelight: trade negotiators.】

item.title: Verizon 在紧张市场中流失的用户数量超出预期
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. reported a larger-than-expected decline in mobile-phone subscribers in the first quarter, the result of heavy competition and less spending by government agencies.】

item.title: 卡塔尔航空与国际大地测量学集团计划在贸易问题上开展联合货运业务
item.description: 卡塔尔航空公司将与英国航空公司母公司 IAG SA 和马来西亚航空集团（Malaysia Aviation Group Bhd）联手创建一家联合货运公司，因为在全球贸易不确定性日益增加之际，这些航空公司正寻求扩大其网络并简化服务。【原文：Qatar Airways is teaming up with British Airways parent IAG SA and Malaysia Aviation Group Bhd to create a joint cargo business as the airlines seek to expand their networks and streamline services at a time of growing uncertainty around global trade.】

item.title: 比特币在市场动荡期间反弹 20%，与科技股背道而驰
item.description: 比特币升至 3 月初以来的最高水平，使人们更加乐观地认为，这种最大的数字代币终于摆脱了长期以来与美国科技股齐头并进的趋势。【原文：Bitcoin advanced to the highest level since early March, fueling optimism that the biggest digital token is finally breaking free of a longstanding tendency to move in tandem with US tech stocks.】

item.title: 巴里克将向约翰-保尔森和诺瓦戈德出售阿拉斯加黄金股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.）正在退出一个阿拉斯加采矿项目，以 10 亿美元的价格将其 50% 的股份出售给亿万富翁约翰-保尔森（John Paulson）和诺瓦戈尔德资源公司（Novagold Resources Inc.【原文：Barrick Gold Corp. is exiting an Alaskan mining project by selling its 50% stake to billionaire John Paulson and Novagold Resources Inc. for $1 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Elevance 认为医疗费用低于预期是一个积极信号
item.description: 在联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：Elevance Health Inc. spent less money on medical care than analysts expected in the first quarter, easing investor concerns after UnitedHealth Group Inc. reported ballooning costs.】

item.title: 美国财报将提供关税将在多大程度上推升物价的线索
item.description: 由于利润率接近创纪录的水平，美国企业有一定的空间来消化关税提高带来的成本。美国企业决定在多大程度上缓解这一打击，将决定 2025 年通胀率的高低。【原文：With profit margins close to record levels, Corporate America has some room to absorb costs from higher tariffs. How much it decides to cushion the blow will determine how high inflation goes in 2025.】

item.title: 香港法院裁定恒大前首席执行官必须披露资产
item.description: 在清算人继续努力从中国恒大集团追回数十亿美元之际，香港一名法官命令中国恒大集团前首席执行官夏海钧遵守法庭命令，披露其资产。【原文：A Hong Kong judge ordered former China Evergrande Group CEO Xia Haijun to comply with a court order to disclose his assets, as liquidators continue their efforts to recover billions of dollars from the company.】

item.title: 称美国例外论终结的战略家认为经济不会复苏
item.description: 一位几乎完美地把握住了美国例外论松动时机的策略师表示，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统坚持其贸易政策，全球投资者对美国资产的撤出将持续数年。【原文：Global investors’ rotation out of American assets will go on for years if President Donald Trump persists with his trade policy, according to a strategist who timed the unwind of US exceptionalism almost perfectly.】

item.title: Nio 期待欧洲合作伙伴克服扩张挑战
item.description: 准备在欧洲推出低价 Firefly 和 Onvo 子品牌的 Nio Inc.【原文：Nio Inc., which is preparing to launch its lower-priced Firefly and Onvo sub-brands in Europe, is recalibrating its expansion strategy due to challenges in growing its network in the region.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩认为关税将在短期内推低通胀率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，美国关税将在短期内推低欧元区通胀率，尽管总体影响 "不大"。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn said US tariffs will push euro-area inflation down in the short term, though the overall impact will be “modest.”】

item.title: 花旗银行认为日本贸易协议将为日元设定 120 点目标
item.description: 花旗集团预计，随着美国当局在即将举行的贸易谈判中寻求解决日元疲软问题，日元兑美元将走强。【原文：Citigroup Inc. expects the yen to strengthen against the dollar as US authorities seek to address the Japanese currency’s weakness as part of the upcoming trade negotiations.】

item.title: 财报在即，大科技股买盘在期权市场消失
item.description: 随着财报季的到来，期权交易员们担心，在没有任何缓和迹象的股市溃败中，美国最大科技公司的股价将面临更多动荡。【原文：As earnings season kicks into gear, options traders are wary that the battered shares of the biggest US technology companies are headed for more turbulence in a stock-market rout that shows no signs of easing.】

item.title: 波兰工资增长疲软预示五月降息
item.description: 波兰 3 月份的工资增长速度为四年来最慢，略低于分析师的预期，这为下个月开始实施货币宽松政策提供了支持。【原文：Polish wages grew at the slowest pace in four years in March and slightly undershot analyst expectations, bolstering the case for a start to monetary easing next month.】

item.title: 德国两年期债券反弹，买家在欧洲寻找避风港
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美联储的强硬态度，投资者在欧洲寻求避风港，德国短期债券跳涨。【原文：Germany’s short-dated bonds jumped as investors sought havens in Europe due to US President Donald Trump’s combative stance toward the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 鹰派英国央行利率制定者格林称美国关税会导致通货紧缩
item.description: 英国央行最鹰派的决策者之一梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，唐纳德-特朗普的全球关税浪潮更有可能对英国的物价造成压力，而不是刺激通胀率上升。【原文：Megan Greene, one of the Bank of England’s most hawkish policymakers, said Donald Trump’s wave of global tariffs is more likely to weigh on prices in the UK than it is to stoke higher inflation.】

item.title: 特朗普升级海上风电威胁后 Orsted 股价暴跌
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府下令另一家开发商停止在美国沿海建设风力发电厂以来，Orsted A/S 的股价在首个交易日下跌了近 10%。【原文：Orsted A/S shares dropped almost 10% on the first day of trading since President Donald Trump’s administration ordered another developer to halt construction of a wind farm off the US coast.】

item.title: 爱马仕继承人 "强烈抗议 "关于 160 亿美元财富的诉讼
item.description: 爱马仕奢侈品家族八旬继承人的财富之谜由来已久，现在变得更加扑朔迷离。【原文：A longstanding mystery surrounding the wealth of an octogenarian heir to the Hermès luxury fortune just got even murkier.】

item.title: 四月份俄罗斯输往印度的石油有望创两年新高
item.description: 由于美国对莫斯科能源业的制裁导致石油运输中断，本月俄罗斯对印度的石油运输量将达到两年来的最高水平。【原文：Russian oil shipments to India are heading for the highest level in two years this month as flows rebound following disruptions caused by US sanctions on Moscow’s energy industry.】

item.title: 环球电信新任首席执行官希望超越菲律宾竞争对手 PLDT
item.description: 环球电信公司（Globe Telecom Inc. 新任首席执行官的目标是实现公司宽带和企业服务部门的增长，以实现成为菲律宾收入最大的电信公司的目标。【原文：Globe Telecom Inc.’s new chief executive officer is targeting growth in the firm’s broadband and enterprise services units to hit a goal of becoming the Philippines’ biggest telco by revenue.】

item.title: 贝莱德的本-鲍威尔呼吁在市场中采取更有针对性的策略
item.description: 贝莱德投资研究所表示，全球投资者正面临着金融市场 "根本不同的时代"，需要采取不同的策略和更具选择性的方法。【原文：Global investors are facing a “fundamentally different epoch” in the financial markets that requires a different playbook with a more selective approach, according to BlackRock Investment Institute.】

item.title: 越南股市午后暴跌近 6%，随后反弹
item.description: 越南基准股指在下午交易开始时暴跌近 6%，随后在尾盘反弹，收盘下跌不到 1%。【原文：Vietnam’s benchmark stock index tumbled by almost 6% at the start of afternoon trading, before bouncing back in late trade to close less than 1% lower.】

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示通胀预期略有上升
item.description: 欧洲中央银行对专业预测人员进行的季度调查显示，欧元区 2025 年和 2026 年的通胀率将略高于此前的预期。【原文：Euro-zone inflation will be slightly stronger than previously thought in 2025 and 2026, according to the European Central Bank’s quarterly survey of professional forecasters.】

item.title: 赞比亚将于 9 月签署最终双边债务重组协议
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长西图姆贝科-穆索科特瓦内（Situmbeko Musokotwane）表示，赞比亚的目标是在第三季度之前与其剩余的双边债权人签署债务重组协议，以帮助结束长达数年的努力。【原文：Zambia aims to sign debt-restructuring deals with its remaining bilateral creditors by the third quarter, said Finance Minister Situmbeko Musokotwane, helping to bring closure to a years-long effort.】

item.title: 越南总理称美国贸易谈判不应损害其他市场
item.description: 越南总理已命令其谈判团队为与美国的关税谈判做好 "充分准备"，同时避免对其他地区造成任何影响，因为越南正努力在避免美国最大关税之一方面取得迅速进展。【原文：Vietnam’s prime minister has ordered his negotiation team to “thoroughly prepare” for tariff talks with the US, while avoiding any impact elsewhere, as the nation seeks to make swift progress in averting one of the largest US tariffs.】

item.title: 沙特国家银行因 "出色 "的盈利报告而股价大涨
item.description: 沙特国家银行在利雅得开盘时股价大涨，此前该公司公布的盈利大幅超出预期，季度利润创下历史新高。【原文：Saudi National Bank shares jumped at the open in Riyadh after the company posted a broad beat on earnings and record quarterly profit.】
